questions.content: The modern art exhibit______ the Kennedy Museum closes next weekend.
Dr. Choi is adding a new______ to his staff, in an attempt to cut down on waiting times.
If the VIP seats in the front row are already occupied, some valued guests may have to sit______
Cross Country Airlines______ a $25 fee for each checked bag, with an extra $5 for any bags over 70 pounds.
Clark Catering has provided______ food services to the local community for 25 years.
The last train to Laketown______ from the city center at 11:17 P.M. yesterday.
Fluctuating fuel prices make it challenging to set appropriate shipping______for ourproducts.
Mr. Ishida ______ his findings to the board at the biannual meeting in September.
Managers should write annual reviews______ so that all employees may receive prompt feedback.
Ms. Parkinson will not be able to attend the managers' meeting on Thursday______ a medical appointment.
______the sales team set a quarterly record, all of its members earned a bonus.
Subscribers can purchase______ tickets for the opening night gala online or at the box office located at 132 Main Street.
Mr. Henderson's previous accounting experience will make him a ______new member of the team.
This year's Worldwide Tech Summit, featuring talks from leaders in the defense technology field, will begin______ at 12 P.M.
Feston and Sons stationery goods are available at select ______ for 25% off thisweekend only.
The Roland World amusement park operates______ , opening for the year in May and closing in September.
Notwithstanding some misgivings among the community, the east end of Cherry Street has been rezoned to allow commercial______ .
Buyers can drive off the lot happy with West Norwich Cars'______  financing and competitive prices.
The marketing director, Ms. Park, launched a new social media campaign______ nearly tripled online engagement.
______ the electricians are coming this morning to fix a switch in the lobby, the receptionist is working in the conference room.
Due to county noise______ , outdoor concerts at Cold Creek Pavilion must end by 10:00 P.M.
Ms. Gomez______ the finance team next month after spending nine years as a senior analyst at Willoughby Financials in London.
Although the sales______ needs a new director, the human resources manager has not yet filled the job opening.
Mr. Zhu has a busy schedule, so all appointments and inquiries must be______  through his assistant.
Kenneth Page, the head of the product development department, is on vacation, but he can answer______ questions by e-mail.
When Mr. Jeffries moves______ the east office, there will be room for all of the accountants to work on the same floor.
Local businesses raised so much money for the city park fund that the garden can be ______maintained for the next three years.
The rapid speed at which technology becomes______makes it even more important to find a cost-effective way to recycle outdated electronic devices.
We have ______your application for the sales associate position at Unwired Electronics and would like to invite you to interview with us next week.
HyView's newest entry into the curved- screen monitor field______a high-definition, 70-inch display.
